title: Avalon
description: Welcome to the island of luxury. Scattered throughout the island of Avalon are enormous amounts of riches and you must collect them and place them in your treasure house. But it's not that simple! First you must find groups of similar gems and click to gather them. The bigger the group, the bigger the bonus. Only the most cunning players with the best logic and intuition will rise through the ranks to become King of Avalon.
